assetProfile.address2: 2nd Floor Shree Laxmi Woolen Mills Estate Off. Dr. E. Moses Road, Mahalaxmi
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: The Phoenix Mills Limited constructs, operates, and manages malls, and commercial and residential property in India. The company operates in two segments, Property and Related Services, and Hospitality. Its real estate asset portfolio comprises retail malls, commercial office, residential, and hospitality projects located in Mumbai, Chennai, Bengaluru, Pune, Lucknow, Bareilly, Agra, Ahmedabad, and Indore. As of June 30, 2020, the company owns and operates hotels under The St. Regis name with 395 keys, serviced apartments, ten food and beverage venues, six ball rooms and prefunction areas, and eleven meeting rooms and business centers, as well as health club and a spa in Mumbai; and Courtyard by Marriott brand name with 193 keys, four restaurants and a bar, and a banquet hall in Agra. It operates malls under the Phoenix MarketCity, Palladium, Phoenix United, and Phoenix Palassio brand names. The Phoenix Mills Limited was founded in 1905 and is based in Mumbai, India.
